objects.specification: A large, flat floor plane covering the entire classroom area, featuring a smooth, hard surface with a subtle matte finish in an earthy neutral tone that evokes a natural stone aesthetic suited to a prehistoric theme.
A tall vertical wall surface with a smooth finish painted in an earthy green-brown hue reminiscent of prehistoric landscapes, providing a backdrop for educational displays and decorative elements.

A wide horizontal ceiling plane with a smooth plaster finish painted in off-white to softly reflect light throughout the room and maintain a bright learning environment.

A classic round analog wall clock with a white face, clear black numerals, and slender black hands, encased in a thin metallic frame for easy timekeeping.

A multi-tier wooden shelving unit with a natural wood finish, featuring open shelves that hold dinosaur books and fossil replicas with clean structural lines.
A spherical educational globe illustrating prehistoric dinosaur distributions with colorful maps, mounted on a slender metal stand for stability and display.
